name: LiquidHub
tagline: Engage your costumers like never before.
description: At LiquidHub, we focus on experiences that help you attract, acquire, and retain customers. We combine research, design, architecture, and technical expertise to create compelling experiences and transform your business. Engagement is any and every touchpoint between a person and a brand. Good engagement holds the attention of a person, but compelling engagement induces them to commit themselves to your brand.
